name: Father
text: I don't have enough energy to make the climb

name: Father
text: It's been so long that we've been here

name: Father
text: I wish I could see the sun one last time...

name: Soldier
text: HEY! Are you guys still alive?

name: Soldier
text: HAHAHA!! I think all take this supplies, You don't need at all. HAHAHA!
